messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] FWD: Give Bush a piece of peace
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know how this Bush message got in here, but I did not mean to send it to this list. I must have accidentally clicked on the list address while clicking
messages.messageBody:
I don't know how this Bush message got in here, but I did not mean to
send it to this list. I must have accidentally clicked on the list
address while clicking on another one. Anyway, I apologize.

Yol
